resources.string: Borussia Verein für Leibesübungen 1900 e. V. Mönchengladbach, commonly known as Borussia Mönchengladbach, is a professional football club based in Mönchengladbach, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The club plays in the Bundesliga, the top tier of German football.

Borussia Mönchengladbach was founded in 1900. The club has a rich history, having won five Bundesliga championships (1970, 1971, 1975, 1976, 1977) and three DFB-Pokal titles. The team enjoyed their greatest successes in the 1970s under legendary coach Hennes Weisweiler and later Udo Lattek. During this golden era, they also reached two UEFA Cup finals and one European Cup final. The club is nicknamed "Die Fohlen" (The Foals) and plays at Borussia-Park stadium.
